did.unittitle: Thomas A. Kochan Kaiser Permanente Research Materials Audio-Visual Materials
did.repository: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Included are the following: On The Same Side : KP/CKPU Bargaining 2005 (on CD) ; Kaiser Permanente : Common Issues Bargaining (VHS) ; The Power of Partnership : Genesis of the KP - AFL-CIO Labor/Management Partnership (VHS) ; The KP Partnership and the 2000 Negotiations (VHS) ; Work Outside the Box (VHS)

scopecontent.p: Included are the following: On The Same Side : KP/CKPU Bargaining 2005 (on CD) ; Kaiser Permanente : Common Issues Bargaining (VHS) ; The Power of Partnership : Genesis of the KP - AFL-CIO Labor/Management Partnership (VHS) ; The KP Partnership and the 2000 Negotiations (VHS) ; Work Outside the Box (VHS)

accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

prefercite.p: Thomas A. Kochan Kaiser Permanente Research Materials Audio-Visual Materials #6251 AV. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.
